001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IResourceLocation;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011
012import org.everit.json.schema.Schema;
013import org.everit.json.schema.ValidationException;
014import org.everit.json.schema.loader.SchemaLoader;
015import org.json.JSONException;
016import org.json.JSONObject;
017import org.json.JSONTokener;
018
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.io.InputStream;
021import java.io.Reader;
022import java.net.URI;
023import java.util.Collections;
024import java.util.List;
025import java.util.Objects;
026import java.util.stream.Collectors;
027import java.util.stream.Stream;
028
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
030
031public class JsonSchemaContentValidator
032    extends AbstractContentValidator {
033  @NonNull
034  private final Schema schema;
035
036  /**
037   * Construct a new JSON schema validator using the provided reader to load the
038   * JSON schema.
039   *
040   * @param reader
041   *          the JSON schema reader
042   */
043  public JsonSchemaContentValidator(@NonNull Reader reader) {
044    this(new JSONTokener(reader));
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Construct a new JSON schema validator using the provided input stream to load
049   * the JSON schema.
050   *
051   * @param is
052   *          the JSON schema input source
053   */
054  public JsonSchemaContentValidator(@NonNull InputStream is) {
055    this(new JSONTokener(is));
056  }
057
058  /**
059   * Construct a new JSON schema validator using the provided JSON object for the
060   * JSON schema.
061   *
062   * @param jsonSchema
063   *          the JSON schema
064   */
065  public JsonSchemaContentValidator(@NonNull JSONObject jsonSchema) {
066    this(ObjectUtils.notNull(SchemaLoader.load(jsonSchema)));
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * Construct a new JSON schema validator using the provided JSON tokenizer to
071   * load the schema.
072   *
073   * @param tokenizer
074   *          the JSON schema token stream
075   */
076  protected JsonSchemaContentValidator(@NonNull JSONTokener tokenizer) {
077    this(new JSONObject(tokenizer));
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Construct a new JSON schema validator using the preloaded JSON schema.
082   *
083   * @param schema
084   *          the preloaded JSON schema
085   */
086  protected JsonSchemaContentValidator(@NonNull Schema schema) {
087    this.schema = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(schema, "schema");
088  }
089
090  @Override
091  public IValidationResult validate(InputStream is, URI resourceUri) throws IOException {
092    JSONObject json;
093    try {
094      json = new JSONObject(new JSONTokener(is));
095    } catch (JSONException ex) {
096      throw new IOException(String.format("Unable to parse JSON from '%s'", resourceUri), ex);
097    }
098    return validate(json, resourceUri);
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Validate the provided JSON.
103   *
104   * @param json
105   *          the JSON to validate
106   * @param resourceUri
107   *          the source URI for the JSON to validate
108   * @return the validation results
109   */
110  @SuppressWarnings("null")
111  @NonNull
112  public IValidationResult validate(@NonNull JSONObject json, @NonNull URI resourceUri) {
113    IValidationResult retval;
114    try {
115      schema.validate(json);
116      retval = IValidationResult.PASSING_RESULT;
117    } catch (ValidationException ex) {
118      retval = new JsonValidationResult(handleValidationException(ex, resourceUri).collect(Collectors.toList()));
119    }
120
121    return retval;
122  }
123
124  /**
125   * Build validation findings from a validation exception.
126   *
127   * @param exception
128   *          the JSON schema validation exception generated during schema
129   *          validation representing the issue
130   * @param resourceUri
131   *          the resource the issue was found in
132   * @return the stream of findings
133   */
134  @SuppressWarnings("null")
135  @NonNull
136  protected Stream<JsonValidationFinding> handleValidationException(
137      @NonNull ValidationException exception,
138      @NonNull URI resourceUri) {
139    JsonValidationFinding finding = new JsonValidationFinding(exception, resourceUri);
140    Stream<JsonValidationFinding> childFindings = exception.getCausingExceptions().stream()
141        .flatMap(ex -> handleValidationException(ex, resourceUri));
142    return Stream.concat(Stream.of(finding), childFindings);
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Records an identified individual validation result found during JSON schema
147   * validation.
148   */
149  public static class JsonValidationFinding implements IValidationFinding {
150    @NonNull
151    private final ValidationException exception;
152    @NonNull
153    private final URI documentUri;
154
155    /**
156     * Construct a new XML schema validation finding, which represents an issue
157     * identified during XML schema validation.
158     *
159     * @param exception
160     *          the JSON schema validation exception generated during schema
161     *          validation representing the issue
162     * @param resourceUri
163     *          the resource the issue was found in
164     */
165    public JsonValidationFinding(
166        @NonNull ValidationException exception,
167        @NonNull URI resourceUri) {
168      this.exception = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(exception, "exception");
169      this.documentUri = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(resourceUri, "documentUri");
170    }
171
172    @Override
173    public String getIdentifier() {
174      // always null
175      return null;
176    }
177
178    @Override
179    public Kind getKind() {
180      return IValidationFinding.Kind.FAIL;
181    }
182
183    @Override
184    public IConstraint.Level getSeverity() {
185      return IConstraint.Level.CRITICAL;
186    }
187
188    @Override
189    public URI getDocumentUri() {
190      return documentUri;
191    }
192
193    @Override
194    public IResourceLocation getLocation() {
195      // not known
196      return null;
197    }
198
199    @Override
200    public String getPathKind() {
201      return "JSON-pointer";
202    }
203
204    @Override
205    public String getPath() {
206      return getCause().getPointerToViolation();
207    }
208
209    @Override
210    public String getMessage() {
211      return getCause().getLocalizedMessage();
212    }
213
214    @NonNull
215    @Override
216    public ValidationException getCause() {
217      return exception;
218    }
219  }
220
221  private static class JsonValidationResult implements IValidationResult {
222    @NonNull
223    private final List<JsonValidationFinding> findings;
224
225    @SuppressWarnings("null")
226    public JsonValidationResult(@NonNull List<JsonValidationFinding> findings) {
227      this.findings = Collections.unmodifiableList(Objects.requireNonNull(findings, "findings"));
228    }
229
230    @Override
231    public IConstraint.Level getHighestSeverity() {
232      return findings.isEmpty() ? IConstraint.Level.INFORMATIONAL : IConstraint.Level.ERROR;
233    }
234
235    @Override
236    public List<? extends IValidationFinding> getFindings() {
237      return findings;
238    }
239
240  }
241}
